item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m a web developer with an interest in devops. Here are some of the technologies I am currently using/learning: Languages JavaScript - Using Go - Using TypeScript - To Learn Python - To Learn Kotlin - To Learn Rust - To Learn Libraries/Frameworks Node.js - Using Vue.js - Using React - To Learn Databases SQLite 3 - Using MongoDB - To Learn PostgreSQL - To Learn Redis - To Learn DevOps Docker - To Learn Kubernetes - To Learn Github actions - To Learn Tools Visual Studio Code - Using Vim - Using PyCharm - Using Sublime Text - Using macOS, Windows, Ubuntu - Using
